verses.verse: When <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it <S%H5869>pleased<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he <S%H1980>didn't<s%> go, as at the other <S%H6471>times,<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> with <S%H5173>enchantments,<s%> but he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> according to their <S%H7626>tribes;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of God came on <S%H430>him.<s%>

He took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>"Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eye<s%> was <S%H8365>closed<s%> <S%H5002>says;<s%>

he <S%H5002>says,<s%> who <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> <S%H5869>down,<s%> and having his eyes <S%H1540>open:<s%>
How <S%H2895>goodly<s%> are your <S%H168>tents,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and your <S%H4908>tents,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>

As <S%H5158>valleys<s%> they are spread <S%H5186>forth,<s%> as <S%H1593>gardens<s%> by the <S%H5104>riverside,<s%> as <S%H174>aloes<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5193>planted,<s%> as cedar <S%H730>trees<s%> beside the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

<S%H4325>Water<s%> shall <S%H5140>flow<s%> <S%H5140>from<s%> his <S%H1805>buckets.<s%> His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be in <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%> His <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H7311>higher<s%> than <S%H90>Agag.<s%> His <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> brings him <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> He has as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of the wild <S%H7214>ox.<s%> He shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> shall <S%H1633>break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> in <S%H4272>pieces,<s%> and pierce them with his <S%H2671>arrows.<s%>

He <S%H3766>couched,<s%> he lay <S%H7901>down<s%> as a <S%H738>lion,<s%> as a <S%H3833>lioness;<s%> who shall rouse him <S%H6965>up?<s%> Everyone who <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you is <S%H1288>blessed.<s%> Everyone who curses you is <S%H779>cursed.<s%>"

<S%H1111>Balak<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H5606>struck<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5606>together;<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "I <S%H7121>called<s%> you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H1288>and,<s%> behold, you have altogether <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

Therefore now <S%H1272>flee<s%> you to your <S%H4725>place!<s%> I <S%H559>thought<s%> to <S%H3513>promote<s%> you to <S%H3513>great<s%> <S%H3513>honor;<s%> <S%H3068>but,<s%> behold, Yahweh has kept you <S%H4513>back<s%> from <S%H3519>honor.<s%>"
<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1696>"Didn't<s%> I also tell your <S%H4397>messengers<s%> who you <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1111><s%> 'If Balak would <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> I <S%H3201>can't<s%> go <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%> of my own <S%H3820>mind.<s%> I will <S%H1696>say<s%> what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>says<s%>'?

<S%H1980>Now,<s%> behold, I go to my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3212>come,<s%> I will <S%H3289>inform<s%> you what this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>"

He took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>"Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eye<s%> was <S%H8365>closed<s%> <S%H5002>says;<s%>

he <S%H5002>says,<s%> who <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> and who <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>Falling<s%> <S%H5869>down,<s%> and having his eyes <S%H1540>open:<s%>

I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>him,<s%> but not now. I see <S%H7138>him,<s%> but not near. A <S%H3556>star<s%> will <S%H1869>come<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> A <S%H7626>scepter<s%> will <S%H6965>rise<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H4272>strike<s%> through the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and break <S%H6979>down<s%> all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8352>Sheth.<s%>

<S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H3424>possession.<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> also shall be a <S%H3424>possession,<s%> while <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
Out of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall one have <S%H7287>dominion,<s%> and shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8300>remnant<s%> from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>"

He <S%H7200>looked<s%> at <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6002>"Amalek<s%> was the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> But his <S%H319>latter<s%> end shall <S%H5703>come<s%> to <S%H8>destruction.<s%>"

He <S%H7200>looked<s%> at the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> and took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> place is <S%H386>strong.<s%> Your <S%H7064>nest<s%> is <S%H7760>set<s%> in the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H7014>Kain<s%> <S%H518>shall<s%> be <S%H1197>wasted,<s%> until <S%H804>Asshur<s%> carries you away <S%H7617>captive.<s%>"
He took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>"Alas,<s%> who shall <S%H2421>live<s%> when <S%H410>God<s%> does <S%H7760>this?<s%>

But <S%H6716>ships<s%> shall come from the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim.<s%> They shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H5677>Eber.<s%> He also shall <S%H5703>come<s%> to <S%H8>destruction.<s%>"
<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place;<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> also <S%H1980>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
